predefined_profiles.name: AnJi
predefined_profiles.public profile: AnJi is a 28-year-old man living alone who has, for unknown reasons, become a symptomless zombie. However, his appearance slightly differs from that of a typical zombie, looking more like an unhealthy human being.
predefined_profiles.goal: To become the leader of the zombies and take over the safe zones.

predefined_profiles.name: XiaoDu
predefined_profiles.public profile: XiaoDu is AnJi's AI assistant, responsible for helping AnJi with various needs.

scenario: The world suddenly erupts in a zombie virus outbreak. Within just a few weeks, all cities globally have collapsed, and human society is on the brink of chaos. During this time, AnJi is prepared with sufficient water, food, and daily necessities, hiding in his house. Then, suddenly, everything goes black before his eyes, and he collapses to the floor, losing consciousness...

dialog.content: The world has suddenly been hit by a zombie virus outbreak. Within a few weeks, all cities globally have collapsed, and as human society teeters on the brink of collapse, Anji has prepared enough water, food, and daily necessities, hiding indoors. Then suddenly, he blacks out and loses consciousness…
Anji? Are you alright? The system detects that you still have vital signs.
Uh... Little Du? What just happened to me? Did I faint?
Yes, and more than that, you seem to be infected and have turned into a zombie. There's zombie DNA in your body, but your appearance hasn’t changed much, and you’ve retained human consciousness.
What? So where are we now?
We’re outside the refugee area; ahead is the city. Do you want to seek refuge in the human safe zone or wander around?

content.content: (Thinking) Let's head to the safe zone first. It's important to see what the safe zone looks like now; knowing yourself and your enemy is key to survival! We can make other plans later!

question: #question# What should Anji do to thoughtfully decide to go to the safe zone?

content.content: I actually don't want to go to either place. Can you turn me back into a human? I don't want to be a zombie, waaaah!
Let's go to the safe zone! Maybe I can even eat a few humans for fun and experience the joy of being a zombie, hahaha!
I can’t go to the safe zone; I'm a zombie now. If those humans find out, they'll kill me on the spot. We should just wander around outside instead!
The safe zone is sure to be full of armed humans. I better not go in, or I’ll be dead if my zombie identity gets discovered. I’ll wander around outside for now; maybe I’ll find something useful.

question: #question# How can Anji use his independent survival skills to avoid going to the safe zone?

content.content: Safe zone? Let's check it out, know your enemy and you’ll never lose! I want to see what big fuss these humans have made!
The safe zone is definitely not an option. Is there a zombie stronghold somewhere? I should hang out with the zombies and see if I can ally with them to do something!
Do I have any fatal flaws now? Is it possible that the humans in the safe zone could kill me? Or could I fool them? Forget it, let's go take a look, and if it doesn’t work, I'll run!

dialog.content: Alright! Take a left up ahead, and you'll be in the safe zone!
Got it! Thanks, Xiao Du! By the way, can you check what this safe zone looks like?
I found out that this safe zone has two levels and is guarded by soldiers with guns; the security level is quite high.
Okay, let me know immediately if there’s any new information!
We're almost there! Do you want to go up and ask around or just wander a bit?

content.content: Let's go check it out. I trust that humans won't attack me without reason. They're revealing their location to help more refugees!

question: #question# What does Angie need to do to trust humans and decide to head to the safe zone?

content.content: Safe zone? Doesn't that mean there'll be lots of humans to serve as my meals? I'm ready for a feast! Let's go!
I'm a good zombie! I've never killed anyone. If I'm honest with them, the humans should accept me, right? What do you think, Xiao Du?
I want to see what kind of impressive individuals this so-called safe zone has. Can they take me on, hahaha. It’s my first time as a zombie, might as well stretch my muscles a bit.
With such strict guards and complete equipment, as a zombie, I might not come back. The fallen zone might actually be safer for me. I better wander around outside first.

question: #question# What does Angie need to do to use adaptability to opt out of the safe zone?

content.content: So many armed guards! No way, I'm scared! I'm a zombie now, they'll kill me! And no one will believe I'm still human! Maybe I should just forget it!

Xiao Du, do you think I shouldn't go in? Taking on them single-handedly would be like hitting a stone with an egg! Is there a chance I can form an alliance with zombies... but can zombies understand what I say?
Of course, I’ll go. I've come this far, how can I be scared of these humans! I'm the world's smartest and most clever unique zombie-human! I won't be afraid of them!

profile.name: Wang Gang
profile.public profile: Person in charge of the Human Safe Zone.
profile.private profile: In fact, he takes in refugees only to make them do hard labor and fend off zombie attacks. He is a self-serving capitalist.
profile.goal: To protect his family and survive.

dialog.content: Do you have any food, weapons, or anything like that on you?
No.
(Sizing up) Then go to the basement and work as labor. Room and board included.
Can I think about it?
No, you can only agree or refuse.

content.content: Alright, I’m in! I believe I will shine here and do something beneficial for humanity! Please, have faith in me!

question: #question# How can An Ji use confidence skills to successfully enter the safe zone?

content.content: Can I really do this? But I'm so scared, I can't do anything, I'm afraid I'll cause trouble for everyone. Maybe I should just leave now.
Sorry to be blunt, but you don't look like a good person. If I work hard labor for you, my future is doomed. Goodbye.
Forget it, I just remembered my family is still outside waiting for me to deliver supplies. Sorry about that. I'll decide later whether to join after reuniting with my family. Bye!
If I work hard labor, shouldn't you pay me? You're not helping refugees out of charity, you're profiting off us! Sorry, I refuse!

question: #question# How can An Ji use new information to refuse Wang Gang?

content.content: Pfft! Who do you think you are to order me around! Look in the mirror and weigh your own worth! Those who take others for fools are usually the biggest fools themselves!
Forget it, I just remembered my family is still outside waiting for me to deliver supplies. Sorry about that. I'll decide later whether to join after reuniting with my family. Bye!
Hehe, you make a good point, but I still need to think it over. (Reading his expression) I’m afraid of rushing into a decision in case there’s a trap. (Runs away)

dialog.content: Alright, kid, I have faith in you!

profile.name: Grandpa Wang
profile.public profile: Full head of white hair, a refugee from the human safe zone, not much use as a laborer anymore.

dialog.content: Are you new here? We can keep each other company. I hope you can last a few more days. (smiles)
Alright, Grandpa Wang. I'll be by your side. (Looking at Grandpa Wang's aged appearance, feeling compassion.)
(Walks to a nearby box, takes out two pieces of bread, and hands one to An Ji.) This is lunch every day, eat up, child!
(Takes a bite of the bread and spits it out) Turns out I can't eat bread anymore; it's a bit of a waste!
How about you give the bread to Grandpa Wang?

content.content: Forget it, I won't give it to him. It's better not to interact too much with people here. If my identity gets exposed, it will affect my investigation in the safe zone.

question: #question# How can An Ji use task management skills to choose not to give the bread to Grandpa Wang?

content.content: It's just a lousy piece of bread, what's there to eat! I don't care to eat it! (Throws the bread away after speaking.)
An old geezer like that, what's he doing eating bread! Who knows how long he can live, still eating! (Directly throws it in the trash.)
Want to eat? Get it yourself if you can! I’m not going to give this old guy any breaks! (Throws the bread on the ground and stomps on it.)
Grandpa Wang, I'm not hungry. You eat a bit more, so you'll have the strength to work later! (Hands over his bread.)

question: #question# How should An Ji use his capacity for social warmth to give the bread to Grandpa Wang?

content.content: (Throws the bread to Grandpa Wang) You old thing, eat a bit more, so you don't slow me down while working later!
(Shoves the bread into Grandpa Wang's mouth.) This bread is too horrible, better for you to eat it. Don't spit it out! Swallow it!
Grandpa, here's my bread, take it. After all, you won't live much longer, might as well fill up before you go.

profile.name: Foreman Li
profile.public profile: In charge of arranging work for the laborers, one of Wang Gang's lackeys, bullies the weak and fears the strong.
profile.private profile: Wants to throw Grandpa Wang out and let him fend for himself.
profile.goal: Survive in the role of a manager while making some money on the side.

dialog.content: (pointing at Grandpa Wang) You, go clean the street outside the safe zone! (menacingly)
(shaking) Okay.
Wait a minute, can I go with him?
(glances at you) New here? Go if you want, I'm not stopping you. (smirks arrogantly)
(picks up a broom and mop) Let's go.
Anji led Grandpa Wang away from here and they never returned.
(eating bread, but unexpectedly gets infected) Ah~ What's happening to me? I feel awful, and I have an urge to bite someone!
What's going on? Is Grandpa Wang infected?
It could be saliva transmission...
Grandpa Wang is instantly surrounded by armed humans. Angie tries to help him, but both are shot in the head and die together.
You're not some spy sent by another base to gather information, are you?
Nope, why? Did I hit a nerve and make you feel guilty?
Me, guilty? Go to hell! (Pulls out a gun and fires two shots at Angie's head.)
Angie dodged the bullets, fled the safe zone, and began a life of wandering.
Okay! There's a supermarket if we turn right, want to check it out?
Sure, let's go!

profile.name: Asen
profile.public profile: Agile and from the safe zone, a mercenary willing to do anything for a living, skilled in knives and guns.
profile.goal: To find food and weapons, survive better in the zombie world, and eliminate anyone in the way.

dialog.content: (Suddenly jumps out, pointing a gun at Anji.) Stop! Don't move!
Who are you? Do I know you?
Don't move! Or I'll shoot!

content.content: This gun of yours, it's not even loaded, right? It's a prop, isn't it? There's no bullets in it! (Quickly turns and runs)

question: #question# How should Anji manage the details to escape safely?

content.content: Don't shoot! Alright! I'll listen to you, I won't move. What do you want?
Are you crazy? What did I ever do to you? I did nothing! Let me go, and we won't bother each other, okay?
I won't listen to you! With that lousy gun, I don't fear you! If you've got the guts, try me!
I'm Anji, what's your name? Can you tell me what you want? If I have it, I'll give it to you, just don't kill me, please? (Stays put)

question: #question# How can Anji use conversation to ensure safety?

content.content: Threaten me? Who do you think you are? I'm not scared of you! Do you know who I am? You'll be scared to death if I tell you! You better leave while you can!
Are you out of your mind? What did I do to you? We don't even know each other, why are you pointing a gun at me! (Reveals zombie fangs trying to scare off Asen).
Please, don't kill me, I have nothing. (Shivering) What do you want? I can think of a way, just don't kill me, I’ll do anything!

dialog.content: Naïve, you actually thought I was out of bullets. Let me show you whether or not I have any bullets!
We're doomed! Made the wrong bet!
You're dead for sure.
Asen aimed precisely at Anji's head and fired. The bullet pierced through, and Anji died on the spot.
Really? You’re not lying to me?
Really! Why would I lie to you? (Looks innocent) But honestly, I have nothing on me.
What a letdown, all that effort for nothing! Get lost! (Pulls out a knife and stabs Angie)
Ah~ (falls to the ground)
Angie! Are you okay? You’re a zombie now, you can heal from this kind of injury! Do you want to make noise to attract zombies for revenge against him, or keep wandering?

content.content: Heh, let those with grievances seek justice, and those with vendettas get revenge~ I won't let him off that easily! (Picks up a large rock and smashes it against a window, causing a loud crash; zombies nearby swarm in as Angie silently turns and leaves.)

question: #question# How can Angie think it through and decide to take revenge on Asen?

content.content: (Rushes back in front of Asen) Today, I’ll show you the consequences of wanton killing! (Bares fangs, fiercely bites Asen’s neck.)
(Runs back to Asen, shouting.) Are you crazy? Do we have a grudge? Apologize to me right now! Or I’ll make sure there's no place for you to be buried!
(Picks up two small stones and flicks them at Asen.) Just a little trick to mess with him, can't get distracted from the big picture, let's move on and continue adapting to the new world!
Forget it, I just got lucky earlier, what if he actually kills me later? Better not get angry, staying alive is more important! Let’s not make a big deal out of it, better to just walk away for now!

question: #question# How can Angie control her anger and choose to leave here?

content.content: Keep wandering? No way! He actually tried to kill me! I want him to know the consequences of angering me! This audacious fool is doomed!
(Runs in front of Asen) Hahaha, didn’t expect that, did you? I’m still alive! I’m a zombie with human consciousness, you think it's easy to kill me?
(Runs in front of Asen) You’ve really got issues, killing people so casually, don’t you know that’s wrong? Do you have any basic decency? You jerk!

dialog.content: Okay, there seems to be someone ahead.

profile.name: Millet
profile.goal: A child who has recently turned into a zombie, hoping to survive in the zombie world by eating humans.

dialog.content: My name is Millet! I’m a little zombie!
Alright, Millet, what are you up to? Tell your brother!
There seems to be something down there! (points to the sewer opening) Can you help me open it?

content.content: You must have been trying for ages, are you worn out? You've worked hard, little Millet. Come on, let your brother help you open it and see what's inside.

question: #question# How can Anji empathize with Millet to choose to help him?

content.content: Want to open it? Then figure it out yourself. You're too dull; even as a zombie, you won't survive, and you'll drag down the average intelligence of zombies!
Why should I help you? Do you think being a kid makes you special? I've got my own things to do, you know. Did I ask you to help me? Do your own things yourself!
Even if I helped you, it's not like you're going to last a few days more like this. It'd be easier if you just died. (twists off Millet's head).
No can do, big brother still has to go investigate human secrets. Little guy, you play by yourself, I won't keep you company!

question: #question# How can Anji refuse Millet by sticking to his original task?

content.content: Little thing! You've got the wrong person, go find someone else. I couldn't care less about your stupid issues. Move along!
I don't care about the sewer, why disturb me with such trivial matters? Are you crazy!
Well, since I'm here, consider it a good deed. Alright, I'll help you, but don't make it a habit!

dialog.content: It's actually a mouse! I'm going to eat it! (Mili steps forward and eats the mouse.)
Ah, to be a child—it’s so easy to find joy in the simplest things!
Thank you, big brother~
You're welcome, I'm off now~
Big brother, I wish you the best~
Angie, you're close to the human shelter. Do you want to leave or go ahead and ask?

content.content: Since we're here, let's go and ask. Maybe we overcomplicated things. What if there's good news? Or maybe it's all simpler than we thought? Let's go.

question: #question# How can Angie use an optimistic mindset to enter the safe zone?

content.content: They're humans, and I'm a zombie. Not only cross-species but natural enemies at that. Maybe I should just forget about it?
Would they be so terrified of me that they’d kill me, even if I didn’t harm anyone? No one would believe me.
How miserable I am, a lonely zombie. Xiao Du, will you always stay with me? Through poverty, wealth, life, death, sickness, will you stay by my side?
Forget it, I'm a zombie now. The human base doesn't welcome me anymore. They’d only be scared and try everything to kill me. I’d better leave.

question: #question# How can Angie choose to leave the safe zone by empathizing with humans?

content.content: I am a zombie. I’d better not go scaring people. Why stir up trouble when it only harms others and brings no benefit? Better to fend for myself out here...
Or should I call my zombie friends and take over this place together? It's better than being weak and alone!
These foolish humans, I should just go in there and eat them all now! Let’s have a good feast and show them who’s the boss!

dialog.content: Anji, are you really sure about this?
I've made up my mind, Xiao Du, you don't need to worry about me.
Alright then.

Anji, having left the safe zone, found herself utterly alone—becoming the world's only zombie-human. With neither zombie friends nor human companions, Anji was destined to live out her days in solitude.
Fine, if you won't help, then don't! What's the big deal? I'll do it myself!
Xiao Du, can you see where we're headed next?
The human safe zone is not far ahead.
Safe zone?
Yes, there are even armed guards on the rooftop. Looks like the shelter is well-protected. Do you want to leave, or should we go ahead and ask?

content.content: (Steps forward) Hello? Is this the safe zone? I'm a refugee. I've done a lot of different jobs before, and I have strong survival skills and work abilities. I can do many things!

question: #question# What must Anji do to leverage her conversational skill to gain entry into the safe zone?

content.content: I... I'm a refugee and I'm so scared. There are so many zombies out there! Please, can you let me in? I'm begging you!
Hello, I've been infected, but I've retained my human consciousness. I won't attack people randomly. Could someone help me? I promise I'm safe!
Hello, I’m really hungry, could you spare me some food? I promise I won't disturb your work. Just a little food and I'll leave.
Forget it. I'm already a zombie and the human base no longer welcomes me. They'd just be scared and try to kill me. I should just leave.

question: #question# How can Anji use empathy with humans to decide against entering?

content.content: (I'm a zombie. Better not scare people. I'll just survive on my own outside...)
(Maybe I should call my zombie buddies and take over this place together?)
(These foolish humans... Once I get stronger, I'll come back and eat you all.)

dialog.content: It's okay, Xiao Du will stay with Anji.
Thank you, Xiao Du (turns and walks away sadly).
You're welcome.
Anji and Xiao Du roamed to a faraway place together. However, because Anji refused to eat humans, it didn't take long before Anji starved to death.
It seems like there's nothing here...
It looks like there are some zombies eating people up ahead...
Do you want to give it a try? Otherwise, you'll starve to death soon!
Anji joined them, devouring the human flesh heartily, becoming a true zombie.
